title: CLDF dataset derived from Chacon's "A revised proposal of Proto-Tukanoan consonants and Tukanoan family classification" from 2014.
citation: T. Chacon. (2014). A revised proposal of Proto-Tukanoan consonants and Tukanoan family classification. Journal of American Lingusitics 80.3, pp. 275–322. doi: https://doi.org/10.1086/676393
